page.title: 07LOCHE PARK
page.content: The ducks in the park are all wild and they come and go as they please.After breeding season the ducks moult.There is a lot of bird watchers who go to the park and sometimes rare birds nest there. In 2 years time the Park has to compete with contracters,and it will be worse working there than it is now, because of cut backs. The gardeners also work there in the Winter,not digging as the ground is to hard,they go round O.A.P's houses and salt their paths. There are 22 rowing boats and 8 paddel boats,and each boat costs about Â£300 each.The putting green and bowling green is always full.The gardeners work 7.30am-4pm Monday till Friday with 40 minutes break altogether.
